name: 合理之行
desc: 将合理的力量运用到躲闪上,在没有掌握合理实质化前,这是早期运用合理到战斗的方式。

name: 混沌之行
desc: 将混沌运用在躲闪上,这比合理更加难以琢磨

name: 低能飞弹
desc: 将合理转化为纯粹的能量形式并发射出去

name: 混沌飞弹
desc: 将混沌转化为纯粹的能量形式并发射出去

name: 归化法
desc: 利用合理来强固防御

name: 治愈
desc: 治疗自己的伤势

name: 反理壁垒
desc: 加强对合理和混沌的抗性

name: 大化法
desc: 降低敌人对合理的抗性

name: 归综妙法
desc: 平息躁动

name: 高能混沌打击
desc: 混合混沌和电流进行远程投射

name: 源灵障土法[筑基]
desc: 提高对木和土的抗性

name: 真水避火法[筑基]
desc: 提高对水和火的抗性

name: 长金破空[筑基]
desc: 勤加练习,越战越强

name: 锐金之意[筑基]
desc: 大幅度降低敌人对金的抗性

name: 化金败木术[筑基]
desc: 提高对金和木的抗性

name: 真火掩金法[筑基]
desc: 提高对火和金的抗性

name: 厚土抑水诀[筑基]
desc: 提高对土和水的抗性

name: 困兽术[筑基]
desc: 降低敌人的速度

name: 死骨复苏[筑基]
desc: 从黄泉引导【三位】【黄泉灵体】帮助你作战

name: 凝界歌于我
desc: 提高防御和速度

name: 大梦如歌[筑基]
desc: 恢复自己

name: 万草荒于沙
desc: 大幅度降低敌人对混沌和木的抗性

name: 流水送昼夜
desc: 恢复自己
Cure yourself or an ally of a charm.
Wake a slumbering ally.
Remove fear from yourself or a frightened creature.
Breaks a curse of silence.

name: cure paralysis
desc: Loosens rigid muscles, nerves, and bones.
Cure sickness on yourself or an ally.
The full weight of a wizard's gaze is often overpowering.
Decreases the target's resistance to shadow magic.

name: pulsing light
desc: A small pulse of light zips around you, mending injuries.

name: pulsing light II
desc: A pulse of light zips around you, mending injuries.

name: pulsing light III
desc: A large pulse of light zips around you, mending injuries.

name: prismatic spray
desc: Lines of arcane energy damage all enemies.

name: greater prismatic spray
desc: Lines of arcane energy strike all enemies.

name: fling stone
desc: Throw a rock using magic

name: mud
desc: Engulfs target in mud

name: raise zombie
desc: Summon a zombie to fight for you

name: fire bolt
desc: A small bolt of flame.

name: searing bolt
desc: A bolt of fire with lingering flames

name: light spear
desc: A barb of solid light

name: greater light spear
desc: A lance of solid light

name: magma bolt
desc: A bolt of liquid-hot magma

name: water spray
desc: A violent burst of water.

name: frost bolt
desc: A sharp shard of ice.

name: frost bolt II
desc: Fling a large shard of ice.

name: frost bolt III
desc: A heavy shard of ice.

name: poison ward
desc: Reduce the efficacy of common venoms

name: vine whip
desc: Vines lash out from the ground.

name: summon hobgoblin
desc: In combat, summon an hobboblin to fight for you

name: summon spider
desc: Summon a spider to fight for you

name: summon raven
desc: In combat, summon a raven to fight for you
Reanimate a weak (up to level 6) undead minion. From the "Minions" tab only

name: greater reanimate
desc: Reanimate a stronger (up to level 10) undead minion. From the "Minions" tab only
Call back to life a weak (up to level 6) humanoid or goblinoid minion. From the "Minions" tab only

name: magic tending
desc: Revive a weak (up to level 6) beast minion. From the "Minions" tab only

name: wild tending
desc: Revive a stronger (up to level 10) beast minion. From the "Minions" tab only
Imbue your weapon with flame before striking.

name: summon blade
desc: In combat, summon a magical blade to fight for you

name: summon murder
desc: In combat, summon a squad of murdering raven to fight for you

name: summon unicorn
desc: In combat, summon an unicorn to fight for you

name: to sand
desc: Transform your body into fine-grained sand.
Command the earth to swallow the enemy
Bury your enemies deep beneath the ground.
Crack the earth beneath the feet of your enemy.

name: sealing light
desc: Seams of light close your wounds.

name: unseen servant
desc: An invisible servant manages your affairs.

name: insight
desc: All your studies fall neatly into place.

name: fire sense
desc: Temporarily increase your natural aptitude for fire.

name: water sense
desc: Temporarily increase your natural aptitude for water.

name: wind sense
desc: Temporarily increase your natural aptitude for air.

name: dark promptings
desc: Malevolent voices whisper secrets to your mind.

name: wild growth
desc: Herbs sprout more quickly from the earth.
Spirits whisper hidden truths as you study.
Curse an enemy with a streak of bad luck.

name: dust devil
desc: A whirl of wind at your feet

name: dust devil II
desc: A whirl of wind at your feet

name: mass jinx
desc: Curse all enemies with a streak of bad luck.

name: sealing light II
desc: Seams of light close your wounds.

name: soothing breeze
desc: A light wind steadies your nerves.
An electric shock leaps from your fingers

name: lightning
desc: An arc of lightning flashes from the sky.

name: doublestrike
desc: Twin arcs of lightning flash from the sky.

name: thunderstrike
desc: A blinding storm of lightning.

name: calming murmurs
desc: Whispers on the wind calm your troubled mind.

name: down swinging
desc: You won't go down without a fight.
flavor: Am I more than you bargained for yet?

name: last stand
desc: Before your body is dry

flavor: Costs 1/3 of your health and deals part of it as damage!

desc: Blast all enemies with crystallized shards of magically charged blood
Raise precious stones from the ground.

name: dbulm's apiary
desc: In combat, summon a really angry bee to fight for you
You can't escape the sky.

name: copper skin
desc: Hardens the skin of the self.

name: iron skin
desc: Hardens the skin of the self.

name: steel skin
desc: Hardens the skin of the self.

name: adamant shell
desc: Your skin becomes adamant.
The earth shakes beneath your enemies' feet
The earth shakes at your command

name: resist paralysis
desc: Keep your limbs fluid.

name: resist silence
desc: Keep your mind active and alert.

name: quenching sphere
desc: Temporarily negate all fire damage.
Herbs sprout more quickly from the earth.

name: blinding flash
desc: A flash of pure white light

name: high tide
desc: Flood the field of battle
A fungal cloud that damages all enemies.

name: sealing light III
desc: Seams of light close your wounds.

name: force ten
desc: The storm before the calm.
Rain hell from above

name: greater quenching sphere
desc: Temporarily negate all fire damage

name: angel of death
desc: A black spirit arises, reaping souls for your work.
